## Data 

Load and preview the data set. 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
y = "2022"
d = "01"

ifl = file.path(
  here::here()
  , y
  , "data"
  , paste0(y, "-day", d, "input")
)

txt = readLines(ifl)
head(txt, n = 12L)
```
